name: YUZA
description:
The main character Mr. "YUZA" is a descendant of an ancient civilization of super black, super magical creatures. The main feature of Mr. Y is the ability to collect coins, and who doesn't like coins?! ))

Game Features:




YUZA - you can collect coins.
YUZA - dialogues in the game - there are no dialogues.
YUZA is a story on behalf of the main character.
YUZA is a convenient management.
YUZA - the game has physics.
YUZA - garbage in the game can interfere.

In the main levels, you need to collect all the coins to pass to a new level.
